nodes.bodyText:
Uhh :-)
I need to find out if this works already with openSUSE and current SLE version.
This also reminds me, that we need to implement these metadata parsing and re-generate in reposync and taskomatic.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,8 @@ Requires:       susemanager-build-keys-web >= 12.0.1
 BuildRequires:  python3-pytest
 BuildRequires:  python3-mock
 BuildRequires:  python3-salt
-Requires:       python3-PyYAML >= 5.1
+# Different package names for SUSE and RHEL:
+Requires:       (python3-PyYAML >= 5.1 or python3-pyyaml >= 5.1)
